flawed_nl_solution:
Jeff was able to run a total of 60 x 3 = <<60*3=810>>810 minutes from Monday to Wednesday.
On Thursday, Jeff ran for 60 - 20 = <<60-20=40>>40 minutes only.
On Friday, he ran for 60 + 10 = <<60+10=70>>70 minutes.
Therefore, Jeff ran a total of 810 + 40 + 70 = <<810+40+70=920>>920 minutes.
#### 920

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
